name: Baldi's Basics in Nightmares
summary:
He's been waiting for you. Somewhere different, somewhere never before spoken of.

It seems he always return no matter what happens. You've unearthed something ancient, something truly evil.

There is no putting him back together anymore.

The true question is, will you survive?
info:
